scripts.pkg:linux: npm run build:prep && pkg dist/billingWorkflowInteractive.bundle.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output build/billingWorkflow-interactive-linux-pkg
scripts.pkg:windows: npm run build:prep && pkg dist/billingWorkflowInteractive.bundle.js --targets node18-windows-x64 --output build/billingWorkflow-interactive-windows-pkg.exe
scripts.pkg:macos: npm run build:prep && pkg dist/billingWorkflowInteractive.bundle.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output build/billingWorkflow-interactive-macos-pkg
